name: Sight's Adventure: Verse Two (Mac)
description:
This is the second installment of the Sight's Adventure Franchise. Join Sight and Christlee on an Adventure across the country to stop an evil army of twisters from ruling the world! You'll answer Bible questions as well as use bizarre power-ups on your journey throughout the lands.
